    		Need some help?
    	IT Support Services (ITSS) provides comprehensive technology support to the Chico State community. Faculty, Staff, Students, and others associated with the university can use the following options to receive support:
                        IT Service Catalog
                    The IT Service Catalog(opens in new window) can be used to quickly and easily submit a request or check status of an existing ticket. 
                        Knowledge Base
                    The Knowledge Base(opens in new window) is a self-serve online library of information regarding a wide range of tech support topics.
                        Account Center
                    The Account Center(opens in new window) allows you to manage your personal account information. If you have forgotten your password, just click Forgot Password?(opens in new window)Quick Start Guides tools and resources available to staff, faculty, and students:
                        IT Quick Start for Faculty
                    
                        IT Quick Start for Students
                    
                        IT Quick Start for Staff
                    Other ways to get help and information:Live Chat(opens in new window) ITSS Blog(opens in new window) ITSS Twitter(opens in new window)Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeMore in our divisionComputing & Communication ServicesCreative Media & TechnologyEnterprise ApplicationsInformation SecurityInstitutional Research and Strategic Analytics (IRSA)IT Administrative ServiceIT Support ServicesTechnology Equity and Inclusion
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
